title: why does Wilmington and new Hanover county have two seperate police departments? It is a small county, and a large town, would it not make better financial sense to put it all under one umbrella??
text:
It depends on state funds and how the city was incorporated. In this
case, the county also covers the county -- which the city does not. It
also may not make financial sense, as state funds often do not match
city funds.
